name: J.H.S.
description:
Short analogue horror VN about two children with the same name lost on an empty passenger ship.

  • Date: April 13, 2001
  • Days After Incident: 610
  • Est. Global Survivors: 60,000 - 250,000

Take the role of a small child lost on an empty ship. Try to find your family while avoiding the maws of an otherwordly beast.

Features:

  • 3,000 word story
  • Three major endings
  • Dark atmosphere and lore rooted in classic horror films
